europeana:record.dc:title: Willem Vervoort as a copepodologist: the impact of his scientific œuvre
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Vaupel Klein, von J.C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: bibliography; biography; Copepoda; history [of biology]; systematics; W. Vervoort.
europeana:record.dc:description: The merits of Em. Prof. Dr W. Vervoort in the field of systematic copepodology are evaluated, such within the context of his personal approach towards science as well as towards his students. It is concluded that Vervoort's work continues to exert a major influence on the study of taxonomy and of biogeography of free-living copepods up to the present day.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Willem Vervoort as a copepodologist: the impact of his scientific œuvre (URN:ISSN:0024-1652) (Volume 323) (Issue 3)
